name: [นบ.1] Q&A ตอบข้อสงสัย

{"className":"org.joget.apps.form.model.Form","properties":{"id":"answerForNB1","name":"[นบ.1] Q&A ตอบข้อสงสัย","tableName":"dgr_regis_license","description":"","loadBinder":{"className":"org.joget.apps.form.lib.WorkflowFormBinder","properties":{}},"storeBinder":{"className":"org.joget.apps.form.lib.WorkflowFormBinder","properties":{}},"permission":{"className":"","properties":{}},"noPermissionMessage":"","postProcessor":{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"jdbcDatasource":"default","query":"INSERT INTO `app_fd_dgr_regis_license`
(`id`,
`dateCreated`,
`dateModified`,
`createdBy`,
`createdByName`,
`modifiedBy`,
`modifiedByName`,
`c_approver`,
`c_approval_date`,
`c_parent_id`,
`c_remarks`,
`c_status`,
`c_activityID`,
`c_activityDefID`,
`c_processID`,
`c_activityName`)
VALUES
(uuid(),
now(),
now(),
"#currentUser.username#",
"#currentUser.fullName#",
"#currentUser.username#",
"#currentUser.fullName#",
"#currentUser.username#",
now(),
"#process.recordId#",
"#form.dgr_regis_license.remarks#",
"#form.dgr_regis_license.status#",
"#assignment.activityId#",
"#assignment.activityDefId#",
"#assignment.processId#",
"#assignment.activityName#");"}},"postProcessorRunOn":"both"},"elements":[{"elements":[{"elements":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.form.lib.SubForm","properties":{"parentSubFormId":"","readonly":"","loadBinder":{"className":"org.joget.tutorial.JdbcLoadBinder","properties":{"autoHandleWorkflowVariable":"true","jdbcDatasource":"default","sql":"SELECT `id` AS `id`
,`c_activityID` AS `activityID`
,`c_question` AS `question`
,`c_questioner` AS `questioner`
,`c_questionerName` AS `questionerName`
FROM `app_fd_dgr_qa`
WHERE `c_parentID` = "#process.recordId#"
AND `c_activityID` = "#variable.lastActivity#"","autoHandleFiles":""}},"formDefId":"answer","noframe":"true","subFormParentId":"","id":"subAnswer","label":"","storeBinder":{"className":"org.joget.apps.form.lib.WorkflowFormBinder","properties":{}},"readonlyLabel":""}},{"className":"org.joget.apps.form.lib.HiddenField","properties":{"useDefaultWhenEmpty":"","workflowVariable":"status","id":"status","value":"Answer a question"}},{"className":"org.joget.apps.form.lib.HiddenField","properties":{"useDefaultWhenEmpty":"","workflowVariable":"","id":"remarks","value":"ตอบข้อสงสัย หรือให้ข้อมูลเพิ่มเติม"}}],"className":"org.joget.apps.form.model.Column","properties":{"width":"100%"}}],"className":"org.joget.apps.form.model.Section","properties":{"visibilityControl":"","permissionReadonly":"","permission":{"className":"","properties":{}},"label":"","reverse":"","storeBinder":{"className":"","properties":{}},"visibilityValue":"","regex":"","readonly":"","loadBinder":{"className":"","properties":{}},"comment":"","id":"section1","join":"","readonlyLabel":""}}]}
